projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.bodyText: A responsive React-based personal website showcasing my work, experience, and skills.

projects.title: Fitness Coaching Website
projects.bodyText: A site designed to present my fitness coaching services, programs, and training tips.

projects.title: MyHealth – Graduation Project
projects.bodyText: A web app for healthcare in Almadinah allowing patients to book appointments and manage medications. Built with Django and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: ABBU – Financial Management Platform
projects.bodyText: A platform for cloud-based financial management. I developed the frontend using React to ensure a smooth and intuitive user experience.
